label: Common Metals
desc: Commonly occuring metals such as Iron. Used in everything from cutlery to spaceships.

label: Shipbuilding Alloys
desc: Rare metal alloys that can survive the frigid void of space.

label: Exotic Elements
desc: Rare elements that are expensive to find and refine. Used in cutting edge technologies.

label: Common Gases
desc: Used for everything from heating to fuel.

label: Exotic Gases
desc: Used in a variety of advanced technology such as shielding, prolonging life and refining.

label: Water
desc: Regular drinking water. Also used in various industrial processes..

label: Nuclear Material
desc: Various elements used to produce nuclear energy and waste.

label: Assorted Crops
desc: Vegtables, Fruits, Cactaceae, Herbs, Roots and Nuts serve as foodstuffs.

label: Grains
desc: Mass farmed grain crops feed the majority of the galaxies populations.

label: Fossil Fuels
desc: While out of fashion fossil fuels continue to serve a use on less developed worlds.

label: Silicon
desc: A necessary material for most semiconductor electronics.

label: Small Animals
desc: Small non sentient life forms can serve as material, food, pets and an excellent draw for tourists.

label: Large Animals
desc: Large non sentient life forms can serve as material, food, pets, an excellent draw for tourists and on some backward planets even labour.

label: Fungus
desc: Can be farmed as a cheap base material to feed the poorer masses.

label: Salt
desc: Used to preserve and flavour food.

label: Spices
desc: Used to flavour food.

label: Mercury
desc: A chemical element used for everything from thermometers to fluorescent lamps.

label: Rhodium
desc: A chemical element that is inert against corrosion and most aggresive chemincals.

label: Palladium
desc: A chemical component that is a key component of fuel cells.

label: Gold
desc: A chemical element that is used for everything from computer components to jewelry.

label: Iridium
desc: A chemical element that is extremely dense and corrosion resistant.

label: Platinum
desc: A chemical element that is one of the least reactive metals.

label: Insects
desc: While often carriers of disease insects also serve as an excellent foodstuff for large population worlds.

label: Rare Bacteria
desc: Used in a vareity of scientific and medical processes.

label: Diamond
desc: A solid form of carbon with extreme hardness and thermal conductivity.

label: Graphite
desc: A common ingredient in electronic devices such as electrodes and batteries.

label: Dyes
desc: Coloured substances that bond to materials in order to colour them.

label: Gemstones
desc: Mineral crystals which when cut and polished can be used either for jewelry or in industrial processes.

label: Heavy Water
desc: Deuterium oxide is used in Tritium production and nuclear reactors.
